Title: SCCM Client Center Automation Library
Description: SCCM Client Automation library is a .NET Library (C#) to automate and access SCCM (Microsoft System Center Configuration Manager) Agent activities.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
SCCM Client Automation library is a .NET Library (C#) to automate and access SCCM (Microsoft System Center Configuration Manager) Agent activities.

Project History
This Project was previously published as a part of the SCCM Client Center Project from http://sourceforge.net/projects/smsclictr

Project References
The following Projects do depend on the SCCM Client Center Automation Library:
- System Center Opalis Integration Pack for SCCM Agent Actions http://sccmclictropalis.codeplex.com
- SCCM Client Center http://sourceforge.net/projects/smsclictr
- Client Center for Configuration Manager 2012 https://sccmclictr.codeplex.com/
- SMS Collection Commander http://sourceforge.net/projects/smscollctr
- Collection Commander for CM12 https://cmcollctr.codeplex.com/
- ...

changes for CM12
- All SCCM Agent related classes are available as typed Objects.
- Automated caching of Objects to optimize performance.
- Windows Remote Management (WinRM) instead of WMI connections.
- All Actions will report the associated Powershell Command.

- C# Sample Code and Class Diagram
